title: Harbinger of Justice
description: Jackson Mississippi is experiencing the hottest summer on record. As the temperature soars, so does the body count of a prolific serial killer.  One woman endures the physical manefestations of her night terrors as she is forced to watch the killer in action.  One cop will stop at nothing to bring the murders to an end; even believe in the supernatural.  As the two team up to stop the killer, they find themselves on a destiny neither could predict.  Violence. Dark Paranormal.
author: Savannah Morgan
